MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Platforms.​LimitedPlatformAccessor
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Platforms.​PlatformAccessorBase
public
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Platforms.​LimitedPlatformAccessor

A class implementing all the bits needed to have a minimal support of a platform.  This does not support the 'io'/'file' modules and has partial support of the 'os' module.

Functions
GetEnvironmentVariable
public override string GetEnvironmentVariable(
string envvarname
)

Gets an environment variable. Must be implemented, but an implementation is allowed to always return null if a more meaningful implementation cannot be achieved or is not desired.

Parameter
envvarname
string

The envvarname.

Returns

The environment variable value, or null if not found

FilterSupportedCoreModules
public override CoreModules FilterSupportedCoreModules(
CoreModules module
)

Filters the CoreModules enumeration to exclude non-supported operations

Parameter
module
CoreModules

The requested modules.

Returns

The requested modules, with unsupported modules filtered out.

IO_OpenFile
public override System.IO.Stream IO_OpenFile(
Script script,
string filename,
Encoding encoding,
string mode
)

A function used to open files in the 'io' module.  LimitedPlatformAccessorBase does NOT offer a meaningful implementation of this method and thus does not support 'io' and 'os' modules.

Parameters
script
Script
filename
string

The filename.

encoding
Encoding

The encoding.

mode
string

The mode (as per Lua usage - e.g. 'w+', 'rb', etc.).

Exceptions
System.NotImplementedException

The current platform accessor does not support 'io' and 'os' operations. Provide your own implementation of platform to work around this limitation, if needed.

Gets a standard stream (stdin, stdout, stderr).  LimitedPlatformAccessorBase does NOT offer a meaningful implementation of this method and thus does not support 'io' and 'os' modules.

public override bool OS_FileExists(
string file
)

Checks if a file exists. Used by the 'os' module.  LimitedPlatformAccessorBase does NOT offer a meaningful implementation of this method and thus does not support 'io' and 'os' modules.

Parameter

string

The file.

Returns
